casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

June 26, 2014

[Cite as 06/26/2014 Case Announcements, 2014-Ohio-2756.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In re Johnson.

On February 6, 2014, this court found Cinseree Johnson to be a vexatious litigator under S.Ct.Prac.R. 4.03(B). This court further ordered that Johnson was prohibited from continuing or instituting legal proceedings in the court without obtaining leave. On June 19, 2014, Johnson presented a motion for leave to file an affidavit of disqualification.

It is ordered by the court that the motion for leave to file is denied.
